summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-eighth Avenue, from East Spruce Street to East Cherry Street; Temple Place, from Yesler Way to East Cherry street; and East Cherry Street, from Temple Place to Twenty-eighth Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein, with necessary manholes, wyes and other necessary appurtenances, in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 31514 and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approved December 6, 1899.
